tool_description: Applies digital filtering techniques to reduce noise in radiographic images while preserving important diagnostic details.

input_image_path.description: Path to the input radiographic image

filter_type.description: Type of noise reduction filter (gaussian, median, bilateral, wiener, non_local_means)

error_messages: Invalid input image: Cannot access or read the specified image file.
Unsupported filter type: Filter must be gaussian, median, bilateral, wiener, or non_local_means.
Filter strength out of range: Value must be between 0.1 and 2.0.
Processing error: Noise reduction filtering failed to complete.
usage: Provide input_image_path, select appropriate filter_type for the noise characteristics, and set filter_strength based on desired noise reduction level.

filtered_image_path.description: Path to the noise-reduced image file

detail_preservation.description: Score indicating how well diagnostic details were preserved
